content.rendered:
Bottled 2006. Distilled and Bottled by Yamazaki Distillery.
In wooden presentation case. Good label. Level: into neck.
The Yamazaki 35 Year Old single malt is blended from spirits, and distilled in traditional straight-head stills between 1966 and 1970. It was matured in special 90-liter second-fill Spanish oak sherry butt casks. Only 200 bottles of this were released, making it a very rare and collectible bottle. This bottle includes box and certificate.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Yamazaki
Bottled: 2006
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Alcohol Strength: 43%
Bottle Size: 70cl
Weight: 2 Kg
